alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:21AM MST until March 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches with the highest accumulations for upper elevation areas favored in southerly flow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph today. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all higher elevation routes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour expected this afternoon in high elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Plan on wintry conditions. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
